[BEGIN]
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input  logic clk,
    input  logic in,
    output logic out
);

    logic d_ff_out;

    // Combinational logic for XOR
    always @(*) begin
        out = in ^ d_ff_out; // Ensure 'out' is computed based on 'in' and 'd_ff_out'
    end

    // D flip-flop
    always @(posedge clk) begin
        d_ff_out <= out; // Update d_ff_out on the rising edge of clk
    end

endmodule
```
